snippet: College presidents and child advocates respond to a front-page article.
abstract: Letters from Miami Dade College Pres Eduardo J Padron and Smith College Pres Kathleen McCartney comment on July 31 article about how elite colleges differ in their approaches to enrolling and offering financial aid to low-income students.
lead_paragraph: College presidents and child advocates respond to a front-page article.

headline.main: Helping the Poor Go to Good Colleges
headline.print_headline: Helping the Poor Go to Good Colleges
